archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0496
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to provision SIMs (+ in bulk) to either be blank with no plan, or have a plan pre-provisioned onto them, so that I can sell products how I like.

properties.value: Agreed after "SIM activation" workshop: SIMs which will be generated and loaded in buld as preprovisioned they are only "blank SIMs", "no plan" will be applicable after grace period. "Blank SIM" means that the customer can buy it, make emergency call, which in fact is outside of Comarch, voice or data connections goes to IVR or VF website for plan selection.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
